official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide that witnesses at Federal grand jury proceedings have the right to the assistance of counsel.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to grant a witness before a grand jury the right to have an attorney present to assist that witness during questioning.

titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to provide that witnesses at Federal grand jury proceedings have the right to the assistance of counsel.
